Articles.Content: I'm not sure where to unzip this mod.  The instructions say to "unzip in the KSP installation folder".  Well I went through the files that I could, I could not find this "installation" file.  I seen a launcher file and I know most other mods go through the game data folder.  I got the game through steam and I'm running windows 10.  I tried to contact the developer of the mod and someone at steam to no avail.  Any help would be greatly appreciated! Thanks everyone.

• How do I install?
    Dump the contents of the two zip files into your KSP install folder. Make sure to delete any old GameData/EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements or GameData/BoulderCo folder before install.

 

Just put it in "game data", so the resulting structure is named as stated above.
